hadiths.text: Ebu Said-i Hudri (r.a.)'den; şöyle demiştir: Resulullah (Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem) Mülamese ve Münabeze'den nehyetmiştir. EBU DAVUD HADİSLERİ VE İZAH: 3376 – 3377 – 3378 –

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْمُنَابَذَةِ، وَالْمُلاَمَسَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Was Narrated Concerning The Prohibition Of Muhabadhah And Mulamsah
